name: Crimson Crescendo
description:
Backstory

The humans have invaded the Crimson. The pact between our kinds has existed for centuries, now broken. Their greed and arrogance drove them to desecrate the oaths of their ancestors, to plunder our realm, seeking unspeakable magic within our dominion. This transgression demands retribution!

Controls

Gamepad Recomended: Controls similar to Hades

Xbox Game Controller recommended
